results.title: Scrabble Magnet | Fridge Magnet | ‘Live Laugh Love’ | Housewarming Present | Wedding Favour | Birthday Present | Small Gift | Thank You
results.description:
Scrabble Magnet 

Ideal gift or keepsake for any occasion

Description:
Wooden scrabble tile art of ‘Live Laugh Love’ with strong magnetic strips on the back.

Please note that due to the natural appearance of the wood there may be some slight variances in colour, pattern and shading.

Dimensions:
Max Height - 8cm
Max Width - 13cm
All dimensions are approx.

Postage: 
I ship to the UK, all European countries and the United States and Canada. The scrabble magnets are posted domestically via Hermes Signed For to ensure safe and speedy delivery. International Postage is via Royal Mail International Tracked and Signed For to ensure fast and secure arrival. 

If you need your item in a hurry, please contact me before purchasing with the date that you require the item by, and I will accommodate your request where possible.

Gift Message:
I am happy to include a personalised note if you wish, at no additional cost. Please provide your message in the 'Note to Seller' section at checkout and ensure all spellings are correct.

results.title: Live Laugh Love SVG File
results.description:
With purchase, you will receive an Instant Download for DIGITAL FILE to be used for various machines and software. No physical item will be sent. These are set up as CUT FILES for CNCs, Laser Engravers, Vinyl Machines, etc. Due to the differences between many machines and software, not all SVGs are created equal. What might work for one software, may not work for yours. However, if you have questions, or concerns about a file, please message me through ETSY directly. I usually respond within 24 hours to questions or concerns. My goal is to make sure you are successful in what you are trying to do.

All sales are final. I do not accept any returns, exchanges, or cancellations But please contact me if you have any problems with your download. 

DISCLAIMER: This listing is strictly for my time to source, select, find, format images, and creative services in making this item. Copyrights of the character images or trademarks used in this design are not being sold. I do not claim ownership of these licensed characters. The fee is only for the time spent designing and customizing.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Don't be a Cunt Mug

results.description:

1" diameter mini buttons (2.54 cm) - Pin Backs, Flat Backs, Magnets, Hollow Backs
 1.5" diameter buttons (3.81 cm) - Pin Backs, Flat Backs, Magnets

Description of back options (price will vary):
• Pin Backs: Pins on back for wearing on clothing.
• Fridge Magnets: Magnets for decorative use - not for wearing.
• Flat Plastic: Flat plastic back for crafts. (no pins)
• Flat Metal: Flat metal back for crafts. (no pins) 
• Hollow Backs: Hollow button shell for crafts (no pins) 

More inspirational buttons here:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/DistinctDesignsUnltd?ref=seller-platform-mcnav&search_query=inspirational

"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""

Buttons are great for so many uses! Party favors, table confetti, rewards, stocking stuffers, pin it on your purse, backpack, hat, etc! Also a great alternative to bottle caps.

* Images are printed with a color laser printer on premium white paper
* Hand pressed with a professional grade button machine
* Mylar cover keeps it scratch & water resistant
* Made in the USA with USA parts

Want a different quantity or want to mix and match sets? Custom orders are welcome!

Please note: Buttons are considered small items and may potentially become a choking hazard and also contain sharp points or strong magnets. Please do not leave children unattended in our accessories.

results.title: Live Laugh Love with Hearts - Wall Words - Wall Decals - Wall Stickers - Wall Letters - Wall Quote - Wall Lettering - Heart Decals - D016
results.description:
This design contains carnation pink hearts and grey word decals. You can choose your own colour combination. Add this quote to any room in the house. It will look especially great on a wall over the living room sofa or in a quiet sitting room. You can cut these words separately, and place them whatever you like.

※For walls painted with "Low VOC" or "Zero VOC" paints, please leave a note.※

NEED A CUSTOM SIZE?
Don't see a size listed that will work for your application? We are able to custom cut your wall decal to just about any size. CONTACT US ★ info [!at] decall.ca ★

◆ Proudly made in Canada!
◆ Come with detailed instructions, a free Squeegee and test decal.
◆ Wall decals come with a paper backing and a frosty translucent paper - transfer tape. They can be cut with scissors to customize its look further.
◆ Made of the highest quality interior safe self-adhesive wall vinyl. Can be applied to any smooth surface such as walls, glass, furniture, appliances and more.

NOTICE
◆ Removable, but NOT Reusable
◆ Please measure the area you plan to install your decal before ordering.
◆ Please note that due to lighting effect and computer colour, the actual colours may be slightly different from the picture.
◆ On newly painted walls - please wait approx 3-4 weeks before applying any decals.
◆ Background Colour - None (your wall colour serves as background)
◆ Vinyl is colour throughout (visible from both sides for glass installations)

★PRODUCTION★

Please allow 1-3 business days (Monday-Friday) for all items to be designed, assembled and packaged BEFORE your order is shipped. Purchasing a shipping upgrade does NOT speed up the production time.

★SHIPPING/DELIVERY★

Once your order has shipped, delivery times will vary depending on your location and customs clearance (if applicable).

We cannot guarantee delivery times unless you purchase a shipping upgrade. Although leaving your event date in the notes section when checking out is extremely helpful and appreciated, this will not affect when your item is received. We do not issue refunds in the case that your item was not received in time for your event, it is your responsibility to ensure you are purchasing the item well in advance, giving appropriate time for processing and estimated delivery times.

Because all our products are made to order, therefore all orders are final. We do not refund or exchange any item. We only replace items if they are defective, damaged, or sent in error.

If we mistakenly ship you any incorrect, damaged and defective items, please contact us within 30 days of the date of receipt. We will cover the shipping fees.

Decall.ca is not responsible if the size does not fit your space or you don't like the colour or the style.

Please feel free to contact us with any concerns/questions.

Decall.ca & MagicWall.ca
© 2010 - 2020 All Rights Reserved.

results.title: Home Decal Live, Laugh, Love Art Sticker Vinyl Decal Modern Transfer For Entry Way Family Living Room Vinyl Wall Lettering-H-122
results.description:
This quote would be great in any home.  "Live every moment, Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words.
 
Vinyl wall lettering is very thin, about the thickness of three coats of paint, and it is applied like a sticker. Your vinyl wall sayings will be sent to you as pre-spaced, pre-pasted. Cut the lettering into pieces or sections if you want, and press onto your wall, tile, window, or other flat surface.

All of our products are made with high grade removable vinyl. This product creates a hand painted finished look. Our vinyl is removable, but not reusable.

We ship with in 1-3 business days, through the Post Office.

~If you need a different size, please convo us to find about price.~

***Vinyl will have difficulty sticking to walls that have paint that has "stain resistant paint", "easy care paint", paint with Teflon, or low or no VOC's.  It will stick to lightly textured walls like "Orange Peel" walls.  If you are concerned with the vinyl sticking, please ask us you to send you a vinyl sample free of charge. ***

Thanks for stopping by!
